messages.message:
Thanks @Hamish for this excellent feedback.

Weâ€™ll see what we can do to address the following issues with some UI/UX improvements:

1. Table previews (make this more obvious when there are more columns)
2. Add horizontal scrolling when columns exceed width of the container for the table
3. Ensure collapse/expand is showing up where it should be - and in the same place across tables
4. Remove extra column, if possible - not contributing anything
5. Adding margin/padding for tables with many columns
6. Consider an on-hover interaction to preview a table (need to research this) to give impression of table size+contents
7. Sticky column header option
